channel.title: VCAP7-CMA on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in VCAP7-CMA on DefinIT

item.title: VCAP7-CMA Design Exam Experience
item.description: For the last month I had been preparing for the VCAP7-CMA Design exam and I am very glad to say I passed on my first attempt. Oddly I found it slightly easier than the VCP7-CMA but that I suspect is down to the fact I spend a lot of my time designing and implementing solutions for customers as opposed to day to day administration of any given solution. So what was the exam like?
